mapper.sql: sb.id, sb.shop_no, b.sys_no AS brand_unit_no, b.name AS brand_unit_name, sb.order_unit_no, sb.brand_flag, sb.create_user, sb.create_time, sb.update_user, sb.update_time, sb.remark, sb.time_seq,c.`brand_unit_no` AS brand_no,c.`name` AS brand_name
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) as s FROM shop_brand sb LEFT JOIN brand b ON sb.brand_no = b.brand_no LEFT JOIN brand_unit c ON b.`sys_no` = c.`brand_unit_no` WHERE 1=1

SELECT
FROM shop_brand sb LEFT JOIN brand b ON sb.brand_no = b.brand_no LEFT JOIN brand_unit c ON b.`sys_no` = c.`brand_unit_no` WHERE 1=1
GROUP BY c.`brand_unit_no`
SELECT s_b.* FROM shop_brand s_b WHERE shop_no IN (SELECT shop_no FROM shop s WHERE s.company_no = #{companyNo}) AND s_b.brand_no = #{brandNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_brand (id, shop_no, brand_no, order_unit_no, brand_flag, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remark, time_seq) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT})

INSERT INTO shop_brand
id,
shop_no,
brand_no,
order_unit_no,
brand_flag,
create_user,
create_time,
update_user,
update_time,
remark,
time_seq,

mapper.update:
UPDATE shop_brand
shop_no = #{shopNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
order_unit_no = #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
brand_flag = #{brandFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_seq = #{timeSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE shop_brand SET shop_no = #{shopNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_no = #{brandNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_unit_no = #{orderUnitNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, brand_flag = #{brandFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_seq = #{timeSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
